name: part_000
file: tmp_【#雪花ラミィ3周年LIVE】ラミィの『大好き』詰め合わせ！Lamy＊Love♡Fest☆【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [215Bq5oo9Bw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro screen for Yukihana Lamy's 3rd Anniversary Live "Lamy Love Fest" with background music playing.
Yukihana Lamy performs 'Our Bright Parade' on a floating stage in a virtual stadium.

subtitles.original: パレ、パレ、パレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade. Shine on.

subtitles.original: 呼び合う声を合図に
subtitles.english: With the voices calling out to each other as a signal.

subtitles.original: パレ、パレ、パレ 探しに行く
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade. I'm going to search.

subtitles.original: スタートは何度だって
subtitles.english: No matter how many times we start.

subtitles.original:
Our Bright Parade
作詞・作曲：堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
Our Bright Parade
Lyrics & Composition: Shota Horie

subtitles.original: ただ独り言 綴った
subtitles.english: I just wrote down my soliloquy.

subtitles.original: ただ始めたくて 走った
subtitles.english: I just wanted to start, so I ran.

subtitles.original: 遠く暗がりに灯った
subtitles.english: Lit up in the distant darkness.

subtitles.original: それは眩しすぎた名前
subtitles.english: That name was too dazzling.

subtitles.original: それは優しすぎる思い出
subtitles.english: Those memories are too kind.

subtitles.original: もっと近づけて手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out my hand to get closer.

subtitles.original: 想いだけ紡ぎ合った
subtitles.english: We only spun our feelings together.

subtitles.original: ほら 今 迷い子は僕らになった
subtitles.english: Look, now we've become lost children.

subtitles.original: パレ、パレ、パレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade. Shine on.

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛しさも連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring your frustrations and your affection.

subtitles.original: 馳せ、ゆめ、晴れ 飛び出せるさ
subtitles.english: Racing, dreaming, clearing. We can fly out.

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは光
subtitles.english: A small prayer is a light.

subtitles.original: 終わりのない日差し
subtitles.english: Endless sunlight.

subtitles.original: 君を見つけたこと 胸を張れるよ
subtitles.english: I can be proud that I found you.

subtitles.original: ここから、これから
subtitles.english: From here, from now on.

subtitles.original: Our Bright Parade, Parade
subtitles.english: Our Bright Parade, Parade

subtitles.original: まだ頼りない予感も
subtitles.english: Even the still unreliable premonition.

subtitles.original: 歌おう 恥ずかしくなんてないよ
subtitles.english: Let's sing, there's nothing to be ashamed of.

subtitles.original: 誰も解けない魔法
subtitles.english: Magic that no one can break.

subtitles.original: いつかまた会えるおまじない
subtitles.english: A spell so we can meet again someday.

subtitles.original: あの日のゼロに始まった
subtitles.english: It started from zero on that day.

subtitles.original: ストーリー 伝えきれない言の葉
subtitles.english: Story, words that can't be fully conveyed.

subtitles.original: 数えるような想いじゃないさ
subtitles.english: It's not the kind of feeling you can count.

subtitles.original: ほら 今 僕らをひとつと呼ぼう
subtitles.english: Look, now let's call us one.

subtitles.original: パレ、パレ、パレ 美しいんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade. It's beautiful.

subtitles.original: 許しあえる刹那 夜はきらめく
subtitles.english: The moment we can forgive each other, the night sparkles.

subtitles.original: 晴れ、晴れ、晴れ まなざし空
subtitles.english: Clear, clear, clear, gazing at the sky.

subtitles.original: ふさわしい旅路とは 君と歩くことさ
subtitles.english: A fitting journey is walking with you.

subtitles.original: 君と歩くことなんだ
subtitles.english: It's about walking with you.

subtitles.original: 「ただいま」を聞けば 「おかえり」って叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: If I hear 'I'm home,' I'll shout 'Welcome back.'

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because it's not something to be taken for granted.

subtitles.original: パレ、パレ、パレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade. Shine on.

subtitles.original: 暗がりを満たすのは 君だ、僕だ
subtitles.english: It's you and me who fill the darkness.

subtitles.original: パレ、パレ、パレ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade.
